text: Saarelainen is a Finnish surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Ilmari Saarelainen (born 1944), Finnish actor *Pekka Saarelainen (1868 – 1933), Finnish farmer and politician *Pekka Saarelainen (born 1967), Finnish curler *Sari Saarelainen (born 1981), Finnish racing cyclist *Timo Saarelainen (born 1960), retired Finnish basketball player Category:Finnish-language surnames
title: Saarelainen
